posts.post_content:

(T213 Merkle sold weeks ago)
2)T206 Waddel Portrait SGC 30 photo album residue on back SOLD***

GB

I'll take the Speaker card. I sent an E-mail.

Also, I may want the Waddell. I sent a comment in my E-mail.

Cy
Speaker and Crawford Sold, Thanks Cy:)
